backend/main.mo: Backend actor defining complaint, solution, and user profile types with CRUD operations, access control, and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing logo and favicon-related features, associated components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file including favicon reference and mounting point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router configuration and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown to unauthorized users with messaging and a button linking back to the main board.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Protects admin-only routes by checking caller role and showing loading or access denied screens.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout with header, logo, navigation, authentication controls, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/CategoryTabs.tsx: Tabs component for filtering complaints by category including an 'All' option.
frontend/src/components/ComplaintListIte: Card-style list item displaying complaint metadata such as category, status, urgency, and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/ComplaintSearchA: Provides UI controls for searching and filtering complaints by text, category, status, and urgency with reset support.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Displays a modal prompting new authenticated users to create a profile with name and optional email.
frontend/src/components/ProofUploadField: Handles file upload for complaint proof with size/type validation, upload progress, and removal support.
frontend/src/components/solutions/Relate: Displays related categories and complaint links for a solution update.
frontend/src/components/solutions/Soluti: Renders a solution update with title, timestamp, description, and related links.
frontend/src/components/StatusTag.tsx: Renders a styled badge representing a complaint's status with color-coded variants.
frontend/src/components/SubmitResultBann: Shows a success or error alert banner with title and message after form submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthorization.ts: Exposes hooks to fetch the caller's user role and admin status using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and logic for login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, complaints, and related data via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/src/lib/complaintTaxonomy.ts: Defines complaint category metadata and a helper to map category enums to readable labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminComplaints: Admin UI for listing all complaints with controls to update status, hide/unhide, and delete entries using query hooks and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSolutionsP: Admin form for creating solution/update entries, allowing title, description, category selection, and linking to public complaints.
frontend/src/pages/ComplaintBoardPage.ts: Displays public complaints with filtering, searching, and category tabs, separating active and resolved items.
frontend/src/pages/ComplaintDetailPage.t: Shows detailed information for a single complaint, including metadata, description, and proof.
Fetches and displays official solutions or updates, with loading and error handling states.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitComplaintPage.t: Form for submitting a new complaint with validation, authentication checks, file upload, and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, requirements, issues, and image processing needs.
